cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiAuthenticator - "Mandatory password and OTP" setting not enforcing OTP on unimported remote users

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: An incorrect implementation of authentication algorithm vulnerability [CWE-303] in FortiAuthenticator may allow an user whose LDAP account is unimported to bypass the second factor of authentication via a RADIUS login portal.
Upgrade to FortiAuthenticator version 6.4.1 or above
Fortinet is pleased to thank Gerard Gerritsen from Municipality of Ede for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.
